EmailTemplate.name: Customer Engineer: 2nd Request for Case Update
EmailTemplate.subject: Update Requested for Case {!Case.CaseNumber}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Contact.FirstName},
I am checking in on my previous email requesting more detail. If you'd like us to troubleshoot, please reply to this message with the information requested. If we don't hear from you in the next <CE to insert number of hours 24, 48 or 72> hours, we will avoid taking more of your time and close the case. You are welcome to contact us again when the time is right for you.
If you no longer need assistance with this issue, please simply disregard this message and the case will close automatically.
Kind regards, <CE name>
